Google Street View

Discover the world from the comfort of your own device!

Brief: Google Street View invites you to explore the globe with a simple swipe or click. Whether it's to virtually stroll down bustling city boulevards, wander remote pathways, or plan your next vacation, this app brings the world's streets to your fingertips.

How to Use:

  1. Launch the Google Maps app on your smartphone.
  2. Select a place marker of your choice.
  3. Tap on the place name or address at the screen's bottom.

Google Street View - Bringing the streets to your screen!
